title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 99.1 - Purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 99.1 - Purposes

State Regulations

The purposes of this Part are: (a) to prescribe rules and guidelines for valuing contracts involving fund accumulations in accordance with statutory reserve formulae; (b) to prescribe rules and guidelines for valuing annuity benefits and structured settlements in accordance with statutory reserve formulae; and
(c) to adopt new mortality tables for valuing annuity benefits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
99.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
